run_info.output: Microsoft Support has published a guide on how to organize your inbox with Archive, Sweep, and other tools in Outlook on the web. The article explains how to use the Archive feature to move emails out of your inbox without deleting them, how to use Sweep to delete unwanted emails in bulk, and how to create rules to automatically organize your inbox. The guide also includes tips on how to use the Focused Inbox feature to prioritize important emails and how to use the Clutter feature to move less important emails to a separate folder.

api_calls.output: Microsoft Support has published a guide on how to organize your inbox with Archive, Sweep, and other tools in Outlook on the web. The article explains how to use the Archive feature to move emails out of your inbox without deleting them, how to use Sweep to delete unwanted emails in bulk, and how to create rules to automatically organize your inbox. The guide also includes tips on how to use the Focused Inbox feature to prioritize important emails and how to use the Clutter feature to move less important emails to a separate folder.

message.content: Microsoft Support has published a guide on how to organize your inbox with Archive, Sweep, and other tools in Outlook on the web. The article explains how to use the Archive feature to move emails out of your inbox without deleting them, how to use Sweep to delete unwanted emails in bulk, and how to create rules to automatically organize your inbox. The guide also includes tips on how to use the Focused Inbox feature to prioritize important emails and how to use the Clutter feature to move less important emails to a separate folder.

The guide also includes tips on how to use the Focused Inbox feature to prioritize important emails and how to use the Clutter feature to move less important emails to a separate folder.
